name: MonkAuth
description: Authentication for Monk API. Caches JWT token in memory for the session. Actions: register (create new tenant), login (authenticate to existing tenant), refresh (renew token before expiration), status (check current auth state). Sets response_format preference (toon/yaml/json) which is saved to JWT and applies to all subsequent API responses. Default format is 'toon' for optimal LLM token efficiency (40% reduction vs JSON). Returns tenant information, username, and token expiration metadata.

template.description: Template name for database model (register only, defaults to 'system')

format.description: Response format preference (defaults to 'toon' for LLM efficiency). TOON provides 40% token reduction and higher parsing accuracy.
